name: vigour-wrapper
author: Vigour.io <dev@vigour.io>

scripts.test-builder: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/builder/
scripts.test-web: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/web/
scripts.test-ios: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/ios/
scripts.test-samsungtv: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/samsungtv/
scripts.test-netcasttv: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/netcasttv/
scripts.test-webostv: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/webostv/
scripts.test-chromecastweb: npm run buildtestapp && gaston test -r node -s test/node/chromecastweb/

description: The native code to wrap vigour apps

selectedPlatforms.description: Comma-separated list of platforms to build (builds all by default)

run.description: wether to install and launch the build on device

url.description: URL to load on app start

main.description: path to the build.js to include in the build

mainHtml.description: path to the build.html to include in the build

version.description: version (semver) to be used for the android apk

versionCode.description: version code (integer) to be used for the andriod apk

appIndexPath.description: path of the apps index file

applicationId.description: the id of the app (as used in the play store)

run.description: wether to install and launch the build on device

logToFile.description: if thruthy the build output is saved to 'android-build.log'

keystorePassword.description: password for the keystore to sign release build

keystoreAlias.description: alias for the key to sign release build

keystoreKeyPassword.description: password for the key to sign release build
